document_data.name: ''Keryth's Helm''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Keryth's Helm''''' was a unique enchanted [[helmet]] worn by the [[elf]] general [[Keryth Blackhelm]]. In fact, Keryth took his surname from this helm.
document_data.Description: The helm was made from black metal and inset with a single red [[gem]] surrounded in [[silver]].
document_data.Powers: The helm imparted the benefits of an ''[[anti-magic shell]]'' when worn. The helm also allowed the wearer to regenerate their health at an alarming rate provided they were still alive.
